content.json:
# Azure Snapshots Insights
Use this workbook to analyze and monitor all your Azure Snapshot resources.

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
where type =~ "microsoft.compute/snapshots"
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = subscriptionId, label = subscriptionId, selected = Rank == 1

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
where type == 'microsoft.compute/snapshots'
| summarize Count = count() by resourceGroup
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = resourceGroup, label = resourceGroup, selected = Rank == 1

parameters.name: Snapshots
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/snapshots'
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup:value})
| order by name asc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = id, label = id, selected = Rank <= 5

parameters.name: SnapshotAge
parameters.label: Time Range
parameters.description: This allow you to filter snapshot by time created.

parameters.name: EnableDeletion
parameters.label: Enable Deletion
parameters.description: By default, this feature is disabled. Enable it to allow resource deletion.

parameters.name: LogAnalyticsWorkspace
parameters.label: Log Analytics Workspace
parameters.query:
where type == 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| summarize Count = count() by id
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = id, label = id, selected = Rank == 1

content.json:
### Azure Snapshots Dashboard

Overview dashboard for Azure Snaphots.

parameters.name: ProvisioningStateFilter
parameters.label: Provisioning State
parameters.query:
resources 
| where type == "microsoft.compute/snapshots"
| extend provisioningState = tostring(properties.provisioningState)
| distinct provisioningState
| project provisioningState

content.query:
resources 
| where type == "microsoft.compute/snapshots"
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where name in~ (split("{Snapshots:label}", ", "))
| where isempty('{SnapshotNameFilter}') or tolower(name) contains tolower(tostring('{SnapshotNameFilter}'))
| extend TimeCreated = properties.timeCreated
| extend snapshotType = case(properties.incremental == true, "Incremental", properties.incremental == false, "Full", "")
| extend locationType = tags['smcp-location-type']
| where TimeCreated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeCreated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| where locationType in~ (split("{LocationFilter:label}", ", "))
| extend provisioningState = tostring(properties.provisioningState)
| where provisioningState in~ (split("{ProvisioningStateFilter:label}", ", "))
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project id, sourceDisk = properties.creationData.sourceResourceId, diskSizeGB = properties.diskSizeGB, resourceGroup, location, apiVersion, sku = sku.name, snapshotType, TimeCreated, publicNetworkAccess = properties.publicNetworkAccess, networkAccessPolicy = properties.networkAccessPolicy, subscriptionId, provisioningState, locationType, tags, Details

copilotNudgeActionSettings.nudgeContent: What is the properties of this ["id"]

content.json:
### Delete Resource(s)

To delete resource(s), select the resource(s) from the table above and click the `⛔ Delete Selected Resource(s)` button below.

armActionContext.title: Delete Resources
armActionContext.description:
# ⛔ **Attention!** ⛔

## This action will permanently delete the following snapshot(s):

{resources:grid}


### Recommended steps before deletion

- Review the resource(s) information thoroughly before continuing with the deletion.
- Ensure that the resource(s) is not currently in use.


### Required Permissions

- To complete this action, you must have _Contributor_ permissions for the Resource Groups where the resource(s) are located.

content.json:
### Virtual Machines Dashboard

Overview of Virtual Machines and the level of snapshots backup protection.

content.query:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where isempty('{VmName:value}') or tolower(name) contains tolower(tostring('{VmName:value}'))
| extend backupActive = coalesce(tolower(tostring(tags["smcp-backup"])), "off")
| extend osDiskId = tolower(tostring(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.managedDisk.id))
| extend vmSize = tostring(properties.hardwareProfile.vmSize)
| join kind=inner (
    resources
    | where type == "microsoft.compute/disks"
    | extend diskId = tolower(id)
    | extend diskSku = tostring(sku.name)
    | extend diskSizeGB = tostring(properties.diskSizeGB)
) on $left.osDiskId == $right.diskId
| project id, name, location, resourceGroup, subscriptionId, vmSize, osDiskId, diskName = name1, diskSku, diskSizeGB, backupActive

resources 
| where type == "microsoft.compute/snapshots"
| extend expectedSnapshotName = strcat("-", "{SelectedDisk}")
| where name contains expectedSnapshotName
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| extend TimeCreated = todatetime(properties.timeCreated)
| extend snapshotType = case(properties.incremental == true, "Incremental", properties.incremental == false, "Full", "")
| extend snapshotType2 = case(name endswith "-sec", "Secondary Backup", "Primary Backup")
| where TimeCreated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeCreated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project TimeCreated, id, name, sourceDisk = properties.creationData.sourceResourceId, diskSizeGB = properties.diskSizeGB, resourceGroup, location, apiVersion, sku = sku.name, snapshotType, snapshotType2, publicNetworkAccess = properties.publicNetworkAccess, networkAccessPolicy = properties.networkAccessPolicy, subscriptionId, tags, Details
| sort by TimeCreated
content.title: Virtual Machine OS Disk Snapshots

content.json:
### Azure Snapshots Inventory Dashboard

Inventory dashboard for Azure Snaphots.

content.query:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/snapshots'
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where name in~ (split("{Snapshots:label}", ", "))
| extend TimeCreated = properties.timeCreated
| where TimeCreated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeCreated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize count() by type

resources 
| where type == "microsoft.compute/snapshots"
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where name in~ (split("{Snapshots:label}", ", "))
| extend TimeCreated = properties.timeCreated
| where TimeCreated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeCreated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize count(type) by subscriptionId
content.title: Count by Subscription Id

items.name: query - Inventory - Snapshots by Subscription Id

content.json:
### Azure Snapshots Insights Workbook

The purpose of this workbook is to provide an overview of your Azure Snapshots resources.

content.query:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| extend title2 = 'Virtual machines'
| summarize count() by title2

resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where tags['smcp-backup'] == "on"
| extend title2 = 'VMs with backup on'
| summarize count() by title2

items.name: query - Summary - Virtual Machines with backup

content.query:
resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/snapshots'
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where name in~ (split("{Snapshots:label}", ", "))
| extend TimeCreated = properties.timeCreated
| where TimeCreated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeCreated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| extend SnapshotLocationType = tags["smcp-location-type"]
| summarize BackupSnapshots = make_set(SnapshotLocationType) by id
| extend
    IsPrimary = BackupSnapshots has "primary",
    IsSecondary = BackupSnapshots has "secondary"
| summarize
    PrimarySnapshots = countif(IsPrimary),
    SecondarySnapshots = countif(IsSecondary)
| extend title2 = 'Backup Snapshots'
| extend title3 = 'Primary Region'

resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/snapshots'
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where name in~ (split("{Snapshots:label}", ", "))
| extend TimeCreated = properties.timeCreated
| where TimeCreated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeCreated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| extend SnapshotLocationType = tags["smcp-location-type"]
| summarize BackupSnapshots = make_set(SnapshotLocationType) by id
| extend
    IsPrimary = BackupSnapshots has "primary",
    IsSecondary = BackupSnapshots has "secondary"
| summarize
    PrimarySnapshots = countif(IsPrimary),
    SecondarySnapshots = countif(IsSecondary)
| extend title2 = 'Backup Snapshots'
| extend title3 = 'Secondary Region'

SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobType == "Snapshot"
| extend resourceGroup = extract(@"/resourceGroups/([^/]+)", 1, sourceVmId)
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize Operations = make_set(jobStatus) by jobId
| extend 
    IsCompleted = Operations has "Snapshot Completed" and not(Operations has "Snapshot Failed"),
    IsInProgress = Operations has "Snapshot In Progress" and not(Operations has "Snapshot Completed") and not(Operations has "Snapshot Failed"),
    IsFailed = Operations has "Snapshot Failed"
| summarize 
    AllJobs = countif(IsCompleted) + countif(IsInProgress) + countif(IsFailed)
| extend type = 'All backup jobs'

SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobType == "Snapshot"
| extend resourceGroup = extract(@"/resourceGroups/([^/]+)", 1, sourceVmId)
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize Operations = make_set(jobStatus) by jobId
| extend 
    IsCompleted = Operations has "Snapshot Completed" and not(Operations has "Snapshot Failed"),
    IsInProgress = Operations has "Snapshot In Progress" and not(Operations has "Snapshot Completed") and not(Operations has "Snapshot Failed"),
    IsFailed = Operations has "Snapshot Failed"
| summarize 
    CompletedJobs = countif(IsCompleted),
    InProgressJobs = countif(IsInProgress),
    FailedJobs = countif(IsFailed)
| extend type = 'Backup completed jobs'

SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobType == "Snapshot"
| extend resourceGroup = extract(@"/resourceGroups/([^/]+)", 1, sourceVmId)
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize Operations = make_set(jobStatus) by jobId
| extend 
    IsCompleted = Operations has "Snapshot Completed" and not(Operations has "Snapshot Failed"),
    IsInProgress = Operations has "Snapshot In Progress" and not(Operations has "Snapshot Completed") and not(Operations has "Snapshot Failed"),
    IsFailed = Operations has "Snapshot Failed"
| summarize 
    CompletedJobs = countif(IsCompleted),
    InProgressJobs = countif(IsInProgress),
    FailedJobs = countif(IsFailed)
| extend type = 'Backup failed jobs'

SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobType == "Snapshot"
| extend resourceGroup = extract(@"/resourceGroups/([^/]+)", 1, sourceVmId)
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize Operations = make_set(jobStatus) by jobId
| extend 
    IsCompleted = Operations has "Snapshot Completed" and not(Operations has "Snapshot Failed"),
    IsInProgress = Operations has "Snapshot In Progress" and not(Operations has "Snapshot Completed") and not(Operations has "Snapshot Failed"),
    IsFailed = Operations has "Snapshot Failed"
| summarize 
    CompletedJobs = countif(IsCompleted),
    InProgressJobs = countif(IsInProgress),
    FailedJobs = countif(IsFailed)
| extend type = 'Backup in progress jobs'

items.name: query - Summary - Backup In Progress Jobs

content.query:
SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobType == "Purge"
| extend resourceGroup = extract(@"/resourceGroups/([^/]+)", 1, sourceVmId)
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize Operations = make_set(jobStatus) by jobId
| extend 
    IsCompleted = Operations has "Purge Completed" and not(Operations has "Purge Failed"),
    IsInProgress = Operations has "Purge In Progress" and not(Operations has "Purge Completed") and not(Operations has "Purge Failed"),
    IsFailed = Operations has "Purge Failed"
| summarize 
    AllJobs = countif(IsCompleted) + countif(IsInProgress) + countif(IsFailed)
| extend type = 'All purge jobs'

SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobType == "Purge"
| extend resourceGroup = extract(@"/resourceGroups/([^/]+)", 1, sourceVmId)
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize Operations = make_set(jobStatus) by jobId
| extend 
    IsCompleted = Operations has "Purge Completed" and not(Operations has "Purge Failed"),
    IsInProgress = Operations has "Purge In Progress" and not(Operations has "Purge Completed") and not(Operations has "Purge Failed"),
    IsFailed = Operations has "Purge Failed"
| summarize 
    CompletedJobs = countif(IsCompleted),
    InProgressJobs = countif(IsInProgress),
    FailedJobs = countif(IsFailed)
| extend type = 'Purge completed jobs'

SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobType == "Purge"
| extend resourceGroup = extract(@"/resourceGroups/([^/]+)", 1, sourceVmId)
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize Operations = make_set(jobStatus) by jobId
| extend 
    IsCompleted = Operations has "Purge Completed" and not(Operations has "Purge Failed"),
    IsInProgress = Operations has "Purge In Progress" and not(Operations has "Purge Completed") and not(Operations has "Purge Failed"),
    IsFailed = Operations has "Purge Failed"
| summarize 
    CompletedJobs = countif(IsCompleted),
    InProgressJobs = countif(IsInProgress),
    FailedJobs = countif(IsFailed)
| extend type = 'Purge failed jobs'

SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobType == "Purge"
| extend resourceGroup = extract(@"/resourceGroups/([^/]+)", 1, sourceVmId)
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize Operations = make_set(jobStatus) by jobId
| extend 
    IsCompleted = Operations has "Purge Completed" and not(Operations has "Purge Failed"),
    IsInProgress = Operations has "Purge In Progress" and not(Operations has "Purge Completed") and not(Operations has "Purge Failed"),
    IsFailed = Operations has "Purge Failed"
| summarize 
    CompletedJobs = countif(IsCompleted),
    InProgressJobs = countif(IsInProgress),
    FailedJobs = countif(IsFailed)
| extend type = 'Purge in progress jobs'

items.name: query - Summary - Purge In Progress Jobs

content.json: ### Snapshots per Location and Disk Size

content.query:
resources 
| where type == "microsoft.compute/snapshots"
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where name in~ (split("{Snapshots:label}", ", "))
| extend TimeCreated = properties.timeCreated
| where TimeCreated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeCreated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize count(type) by location
content.title: Snapshots Count by Location

content.query:
resources 
| where type == "microsoft.compute/snapshots"
| where resourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroup:value})
| where name in~ (split("{Snapshots:label}", ", "))
| extend TimeCreated = properties.timeCreated
| where TimeCreated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeCreated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| extend diskSizeGB = properties.diskSizeGB
| summarize count(diskSizeGB) by tostring(diskSizeGB)
content.title: Snapshots Count by Source disk size (GiB)

content.json:
### Azure Snapshots Purge Jobs

Overview dashboard for Azure Snaphots Purge Jobs.

parameters.name: PurgeSourceVmName
parameters.label: Virtual Machine name
parameters.description: Filter purge jobs by virtual machine

content.query:
let FirstOps = SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobType == "Purge" 
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| where jobStatus in~ (split("{PurgeJobStatus:label}", ", "))
| extend vmName = tostring(split(sourceVmId, "/")[8])
| where isempty('{PurgeSourceVmName:value}') or tolower(vmName) contains tolower(tostring('{PurgeSourceVmName:value}'))
| summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, *) by jobId;

SnapshotsOperations_CL
| join kind=inner (FirstOps) on jobId
| where jobType == "Purge" 
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by jobId
| extend DurationMinutes = todouble(TimeGenerated - TimeGenerated1) / 600000000.0
| project TimeGenerated, jobId, jobStatus, DurationMinutes, sourceVm = sourceVmId, sourceDisk = sourceDiskId, temporarySnapshot = primarySnapshotId, backupSnapshot = secondarySnapshotId, sourceLocation = primaryLocation, backupLocation = secondaryLocation
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobId == "{SelectedJob}"
| where jobType == "Purge"
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project TimeGenerated, jobId, jobOperation, jobStatus, message, sourceVm = sourceVmId, sourceDisk = sourceDiskId, temporarySnapshot = primarySnapshotId, backupSnapshot = secondarySnapshotId, sourceLocation = primaryLocation, backupLocation = secondaryLocation, Details
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Job Operations Details

content.json:
### Azure Snapshots Backup Jobs

Overview dashboard for Azure Snaphots Backup Jobs.

content.query:
let FirstOps = SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobType == "Snapshot" 
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| where jobStatus in~ (split("{JobStatusFilter:label}", ", "))
| extend vmName = tostring(split(sourceVmId, "/")[8])
| where isempty('{SourceVmName:value}') or tolower(vmName) contains tolower(tostring('{SourceVmName:value}'))
| summarize arg_min(TimeGenerated, *) by jobId;

SnapshotsOperations_CL
| join kind=inner (FirstOps) on jobId
| where jobType == "Snapshot" 
| where TimeGenerated >= {SnapshotAge:start} and TimeGenerated <= {SnapshotAge:end}
| where jobStatus in~ (split("{JobStatusFilter:label}", ", "))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by jobId
| extend DurationMinutes = todouble(TimeGenerated - TimeGenerated1) / 600000000.0
| project TimeGenerated, jobId, jobStatus, DurationMinutes, sourceVm = sourceVmId, sourceDisk = sourceDiskId, temporarySnapshot = primarySnapshotId, backupSnapshot = secondarySnapshotId, sourceLocation = primaryLocation, backupLocation = secondaryLocation
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

SnapshotsOperations_CL
| where jobId == "{SelectedJob}"
| where jobType == "Snapshot"
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project TimeGenerated, jobId, jobOperation, jobStatus, message, sourceVm = sourceVmId, sourceDisk = sourceDiskId, temporarySnapshot = primarySnapshotId, backupSnapshot = secondarySnapshotId, sourceLocation = primaryLocation, backupLocation = secondaryLocation, Details
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Job Operations Details
